revisionDesc.change: EF: additional corrections carried out/problems solved

div.p:
Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos
xviijo die februarij Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo Septimo

the samyn day it was fundin and preuit lauchfullie that alexander sanchar is avande to Androw
goldsmitht x s' and vj d' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him pay within terme of law

the samyn day the borghe' strekit be Dauid galichtly apone alexander chamer for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of ane oxe is continevit quhil the thrid day of marche
with consent of party

the samyn day Jonhe' fechat grantit to gif State of his lande liand' in the castalgat
to Syme of gardyn'

The saide day Comperit mastir Androw cadiow befor the alderman and balyeis sittand
in Jugement and follouit Robert blinsel alexander rede thomas prat Androw murray
elder Ranald' talyour Androw Wenton' Dauid simsone Jonhe' grige William filbe
Walter thomson' and vthiris merchandis for the wranguis' haldin fra him of sex
scoire pundis gretis for the perseuyt of thar gudis in the courte of burgunye
eftir the tenour of the ak maid tharapone obefor quhilkis Some the said
merchandis be tham self and alexander rede thar forspekar denyit offeringe tham
to vnderly the decision' of ane assis' vnsuspek And' eftir diuers' commomg altercacion
the saide actione with consent of batht the said' partiis was putt to the
decisione of thar personis vnder writin chosin' with batht thar' avis' and consent
opinly suorne in assis' In thar presence that is to say to alexander menyeis James leslie
Jonhe' colisone Jonhe' of Culan alexander mar Jonhe' Wormet Walter auchneyve
Jonhe' moire alexander gray thomas mar Jonhe' menyes Androw culane
yonger James colisone henry hourum and Androw culan elder quhilkis riplie
avisit deliuerit and faind' be the moutht of James leslie forspekar of the
saide assis' ale the said' merchandis quyt of the wranguis' haldinge
of the Sex scoire lib' g' clamyt be mastir Androw cadiow excempt Robert
blinsele quhilk hes subscriuit the obligacion producit be the said' mastir
Androw in Jugement

the saide day the assis' befor writin eftir thai herde herde seyne considerit
and vndirstandyne ale the richtis of batht the saide partiis askit and requirit
him to schew thame gif he hed' ony mar' richtis in contrar the saide personis
quhilk mastir Androw said' he hede ane procuratory quhilk he hede last
In flandris

Curia ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die februarij anno
quo supra

the samyn day Jonhe' steuinsone has dravin his landis and gudis to
William blinsele to find' Souerte to pay Jonhe' Wormet iiijor barrell
salmond' at the nixt mydsummire or evtir to pay him xij li' siluer

The samyn day Johne' Sthevinson' In presence of the aldirman and balyes grantit him avand'
to Copin Andrees' and his factouris Sevin li'

the samyn day Williame blinsele and Jonhe' Sthevinsone was oblist and Suorne
the gret aithe to stande at the ordinance and deliuerance of thir personis James leslie
alexander rede and thomas prat anent the debatis of the chavmerlanis taxt Ande
anent ale vthir debatis and clames betuix tham debatable' quhilkis thre personis
was suorne to gif furtht thar deliuerance tharapon' be this day xv dais Ande
thomas chamer is oblist to stande at thar ordinance anent the said' taxte

Tercio die marcij Anno ut supra In presencia Willelmi blinsell et Johannis steuinson balliuorum
Actio mota per Dauid galichtlie contra alexandrum chamer cum consessu parcium continatur vsque ad capitalem
Curiam proximam legalem sub spe concordie absque preiudicio partis

the viij day of marche the yer forsaid James of leslie Robert blinsel alexander
rede thomas prat Androw Wentone and mastir Jhone gray ar chosin and suorne
lynaris to vs' ande excers' the office of lynyne lelelie and treulie to the next michaelmes'
And' Jhone of Culane and Wat auchneywe ar chosin and suorne tharto

The viii day of marche the yer forsaide James leslie alexander rede and thomas prat
chosin to decide the debatis betuix Williame blinsel ande Jhone steuinson et cetera deliuerit
ande ordanit that Jhone steuinsone sal gif xl s' of siluer to the said William Ande
the said Williame sal bring ane sufficient discharge fra the lard of guthtre
chamerlane for the tyme of tene s' of annuell that he is in state of of the saide
Jhonnis lande xv dais befor the next Witsonday ande mak his lande als'
fre of the said annuell as it was obefor Ande gif the saide Williame blin
sell falyeis in the hambringyne of the saide discharge he sal gif ix li'
of Siluer to the saide Jhone viij dais befor the next Witsonday

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos decimo die marcij Anno Domini
et cetera lxxxvijo

the quhilk day Jhone Wormet come dettour' to the aldirman
to pay xv lib' of Siluer acht to the Danskin mene quhat tyme that
he be requerit tharto be the aldirman of or the balyeis And Alexander
menyeis come dettour to the saide Jhone Wormet to releif and freith' him
of tene pundis of the saide some quhene euere he beis requerit to mak
pament of the samyne

The samyne day Williame of Kintor grantis him avande to Richerd of
crafurde xxiiij s' of Siluer And allegit that a mane of fyndone had
pait it one his behalf And gif it be vnpait to pay it within terme
of law

The samyne day the aldirman ande consal present for the tyme ordanit
that Androw Cullane or ane vthir persone of the consal sale sytt with the
curat at pasche quhene he resauis the pasche fynis and sal resaue the
doublyne of the clerkschip of the tone to be gevin to Robert huchoson
ande the remanent of his fee to be pait be the tone

The quhilk day Alexander rede offerit him redy In presens of thome of mar' to
vndirly ane decisione of ane assis' anent al gudis that thomas mar' coud'
clame him furthtwith but ony dilatour and askit certification herapon vnder ane
balyeis seile

The quhilk day the balye assignit the law day eftir pasche to thome
of mar to ansuer to ansuer to Alexander rede for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of a barrell of Salmonde and tene s' g'

Eodem die thomas chamer deuenit plegium legalis quod Johannes androsone
seruus alexandri rede et alij sui serui erunt Indempnes pro eo aliter quam
per viam Juris pro thoma kintor et Idem thomas kintor obli
gatur per manum ad releuandum dictum thomam de camera de huiusmodi fidemissione

Duodecimo Die marcij Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo Septimo Willelmus futhes
fecit creauit et ordinavit Walterum auchneywe et thomam chapman coniunctim
et diuisim suos procuratores ad prosequendum quandam terram Jacentem in vico Nauium
et cetera ac in omnibus aliis actionibus ipsum concernentibus promitten' de Rato et grato
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xiii die marcij Anno quo supra

the quhilk day Syme of gardin comperit In presens of the alderman balyeis
and part of the consale and perofferit him redy to content and pay to Jhon' fechat
eldar al somes of money batht one this side the sey and beyond the sey
acht to him for ane lande bocht fra him In the quhilk he is lauch'
fullie possessit be the resignacione of the saide Jhon' and his spous' maid in ane
balyeis hande And thareftir he perofferit golde and siluer redy to pay al somes
of Scottis money that he aw one this side the sey to be pait And his
obligacion selit of the flandris money acht to him for the said lande
And' forther he perofferit him redy to fullfill al thingis contenit in the
contrak maide betuix' thame tharapon' and askit certificacion tharapon'
vnder the sele of caus'

Eodem die Symon gardin constituit et creauit thomam prat thomam de camera
et elizabeth' Rattre sponsam suam suos procuratores legitimos in dicta actione et
in omnibus aliis actionibus causis et querelis ipsum concernentibus promitten'
de Rato et grato in strictissima forma procuratorij
Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvij die martij anno quo supra

the quhilk day William philp grantit him dettour to alexander gareache
for viij s' of Siluer for Jok Culane mathowson the quhilk the balyeis
chargit him to pay to the said alexander or to his wif or Jhon' glenmal
uyne within terme of law

the said day it was fundyne and deliuerit be ane assis' James of leslie forspekar
that Dauid mathesone sal depone be his aith' pwnt be poynt tile Ilkan
thing clamyt be Jhone of gilespy eftir the tenor of his bill

The samyne day Richerd of cullane grantit him avand tene pundis gret to William
of abirdour quhilk he resauit of his in flandris and promittit to pay fiwe li' g'
in flandris to the said William or his factouris eftir the erast schipis sayland out of
the port of Abirdene cumis to flandris And' vthir fiwe pundis gret in the erast schip
pis that pass' out of the said port thareftir and aryvis within the port of flandris
but ony langer delay

The samyne day it was deliuerit be the aldirman Robert blinsell and thomas fif
chosin betuix thome simson one that ane part and Alexander sanchar' one that vthir part
amicabile compositoris and summissoris to decerne al debatis and clamis betuix'
thame and anent al somez of salt siluer colis and salmond' contenit in the akis
ebefor that the saide thomas symsone sal pay and refunde to the said alexander
sanchar' j barrell of Salmond' betuix this and mydsummir next to cum and
fiwe s' of Siluer the quhilk j barrel of salmond the said alexander assignit to
mastir Androw cadiow and the said thomas come full dettour be his hand to
pay the said barrell of Salmond to the said mastir Androw be the said
terme And' atour we fynd' and deliuer' Ilkan of the said partiis quyt of
vthiris clamis to this day
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die marcii anno quo supra

the quhilk day Jhone of gilespy deponit the gret bodely aitht In presens of the
aldirman and ballieis that the pece lande liand emew Dauid mathosonnis
yet betuix the gauyll of his hous' and the yet aw yerlie to our lady altar
ane annuell rent of tuelf d'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxi die marcii anno ut supra

the quhilk day the alderman ande balyeis and the haile court assignit the
law day eftir pasche to Wat of auchneywe to ansuer' to a borche
strekit apone him be the said mastir Androw for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him
of xl s' or alsmekile pennywortis at the wil of the saide mastir lik as he
promittit to him for the seling' of ane charter as day of peremptour

The quhilk day the alderman ande balyeis ordanit Robert club seriande
to warne Dauid mathesone to comper befor thame to morne as day
of peremptour to depone anent Jhone of gilespys' bill as the assis'
has deliuerit obefor'

Eodem die Johannes Dee incola edinburgi fecit constituit et ordanit ordinavit thomam
fif et Willelmum yonge coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores legitimos ad petendum
exigendum et recipiendum a magistro gilberto Colison summam xvij marcarum monete
scocie de resta cuiusdam obligacionis de maiore summa Et de receptis acquitand'
Ipsummet prosequend' in vberiore forma procuratorij cum omnibus terminis necessariis
promitten' de Rato et grato

Curia capitalis tenta in pretorio per balliuos burgi
de Abirdene xiiijto die Aprilis anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo octavo

the quhilk day the aldirman balyeis consal and communite present for
the tyme ordanit ane letter of complant to be maide apone
Alexander menyeis Alexander chamer James of leslie Jhone Colisone
Thome prat and Androu murray for taxing' of tham and takin fra
thame of vjc li'

The saide day morice bissat at commavnd of the aldirman and
ballieis chargit Jhone Wormet ande Jhone of Culane be his
wande to remane within the tolbutht quhil thai pait the siluer
acht to the Danskynemen eftir the tenor of the akis maid obefor

The saide day the balyeis chargit thome simsone to remane
within the tolbutht quhil he red and pait demi last of Salmond'
and ij markis of Siluer to thome Wode of edinburghe' eftir the
tenor of our Souerane lordis lettres of decret gevin tharapon'

The balyeis assignit this day xv dais to morice bissat
to ansuer tile Ane borche strekit apone him be alexander sanchar
for the wranguis' withhaldyne fra him of xviij s' g' quhilkis he
pait for him to gerald' ourdaile porter of brugis

The samyn day the balyeis assignit this day cu' xv dais to Dauid mar' to
ansuer til a borghe' strekit apone him be Jhone malison in the handis
of Duncan straloche for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of thre Jakis and
auche to deliuer thame to him agane and wrangis that he dois nocht

The samyn day Jhone of Culane Alexander menyeis ande Jhone Wormet oblist thaim
be the fathtis of thar bodiis lelely and treulie to content and pay to the men'
of Danskin' for the want of thar siluer in tyme of the blak money in lenteryne
wair ande futuale penny and' penny worthtis for siclik price as fremmit
mene may by it for Reddy siluer in hand fra merchandis of the toune

the quhilk day the balyeis continevit the dome of the proces' led be ser mathow
nicholson of the land liand in the Gallougat to this day xv dais for waknes'
of the court without preiudice

the samyne day the balyeis continevit the dome of the proces' led be the minister of the
trinite freris of the land liand one the est part of the samyn place to this day xv dais
for waknes of the court without preiudice

Eodem die Willelmus Kintor accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo
redditu xl d' sibi debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum
inter terram ipsius Willelmi ex orientali ex vna et terram Johannis talyour ex boreali et communionem
viam regiam ex occidentali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam secundo die huius
processus Testibus Willelmo verty Roberto talyour et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die dominus Johannes Stiruelin capellanus ac procurator capelle beate Katerine virginis
accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu vj s' et viij d'
sibi debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico Nauium inter terram
quondam Duncani byrs' ex australi et terram henrici forbes ex boreali ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo
ballivis presentavit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Alexandro talyour Wllelmo
quhitbrow et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die dominus Alexander vocat collector et procurator collegij Abirdonensis et eo nomine
accedens ad barram protestans pro vno annuo redditu decim s' sibi et dictis
capellanis debit' p de predicta terra vasta Jacente in vico Nauium inter terram
quondam Duncani byrs' ex australi et terram henrici forbes ex boreali ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo
ballivis presentavit curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Alexandro tailyour'
Willelmo quhitbrow et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die frater petrus stiruelin' minister domus sancte trinitatis de Abirdene protestatus fuit pro vno
annuo Redditu xxx d' dicte domui et sibi debit' de quodem orto vasto Jacente prope
locum dicte domus ex orientali parte eiusdem ad quam terram accedens nichi nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentauit in curia
tanquam quarto die huius processus Testibus Johanne Wallace Dauid egow b et Duncano
straloche seriando

Eodem die thomas chapman procuratorio nomine Willelmi futhes accedens ad barram
protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu vj s' sibj debit' de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in vico Nauium inter quondam Duncanj byrs' ex australi et terram henrici
forbes ex boreali ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
da testibus Dauid gichtam Johanne talyour et moricio byssat seriando .

Eodem die dominus matheus nicholson capellanus beati petri infra ecclesiam beati Nicholaij de Abirdene cituati
accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu xx s' sibi et eidem altari debit'
annuatim de quadam terra Jacente in vico furcarum ex parte orientali eiusdem vici inter terram quondam
Walteri pyot ex australi et terra olim thome crovdane ex boreali ad quam terram
accedens Nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia ballivis tanquam quarto die huius
processus testibus Johanne Wallace Dauid egow et Duncano straloche seriando

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per ballivos xixo
die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera lxxxviijo

Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem georgei hervy
Alexander chamer Junior Johannes Wormet thomas prat Andreas murray senior
Johannes glenmaluyn Richardus hil senior Jacobus Colison Willelmus philp
Alexander Rolland Jacobus Kennerty gilbertus Riburne Richardus litstar'
et Johannes chapman Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Jacobus heruy
pater georgei heruy latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus de feodo
ad pacem et fidem dominj nostri Regis de quadam terra seu tenemento Jacente infra
libertatem et burgagium de Abirdene in le futy inter terram quondam Alexandri
Kintor ex boriali ex vna et terram quondam Willelmi Westland ex australi
partibus ex altera Et quod dictus georgius est legittimus et propinquor heres
quondam dicti Jacobi patris sui de dicto tenemento cum partis et quod est legitime etatis
Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum quatuor s' et valuit tempore pacis Et
quod tenere in capite de Supprimo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgale
Et nunc existit in manibus dicti dominj thome hervy auunculi suj pro toto tempore
vite sue racione liberi tenementi per quoddam appunctuamentum inter dictum
dominum thomam et quondam Jacobum hervy fratrem suum initum et tractatum datum et
clausum sub Sigillo Willelmi Kintor ballivi ac Sigillis quorundam qui huic Inquisicionem
intererant faciende Anno die mense et loco prenotatis
Curia legalis tenta per balliuos xxix die Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera lxxxviijo

Eodem die Dauid mar super quem Johannes malisone porrexit plegium pro iniusta
detencione ab eo trium bbitiniorum primo die vocatus ad respondendum non comparuit quare
precipitur Duncano straloche seriando capere districtum a dicto Dauid mar et premunire
eum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundem diem processus

Eodem die dominus thomas heruy In procuratoria thome fif vnius' balliuorum
dicti burgi solempniter protestatus fuit quod sasina alias georgio heruy
exhibit' de quadam terra Jacente in futy non cedat sibj in preiudicium quo ad liberum
tenementum eiusdem sibi suspectan' pro toto tempore vite suo ut asseruit

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxviijo die maij
Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo octauo

The samyne day Androw branche folouit and persevit patrik hile
of the waring of iiij barrelis and demi of Salmond and j barrel of girls'
eftir the tenor' of his bile deliuerit to him the quhilkis fische the
said patrik grantit he Intromettit with and sauld tham to Ane callit cayfeir'
Of the quhilkis the said Androw askit pament eftir the tenor' of his
said bill of waring' And in continent with consent of the said partiis
the said actione' was putt tile ane assis' the quhilkis Riply
avisit the gret aith' suorne fand and deliuerit be the moutht of Robert
blinsell forspekar of the said assis''assis' overwrites something else. that the said patrik hil sal fulfill
the bile of waring' deliuerit to him be the said Androw of the saide
fische in wyne and vthir merchandice contenit in the said bill eftir the quantite
of the Siluer that he resavit for the said fische And' thai fand the saide
Androuis aventour' was passit becaus' the said gudis suld haff
bene layde one the keruelis bodovme the quhilk is now cumyn
hame and the aventour is passit

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' that Wat thomsone sal lott
scott and pay with his nichtbouris siclik as thai haf payt and pays in
tym to cum in the defence of the action persevit be mastir Androw cadiow agane
the certane merchandis of the said burghe for the folloing' of thar gudis in the
court of burgunye as the said mastir Androw allegis
